data.title: Famous Birthdays on August 16
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 16th of August. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on August 16.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 255

Philippa, 5th Countess of Ulster, born in Eltham Palace, Kent, England (d. 1382)

Emilie Juliane of Schwarzburg-Rudolstadt, German countess and poet (d. 1706)
